title: Week 5 Waivers + Full Stream Ahead, Time to Trade? - Fantasy Football Podcast for 10/5
description:
Week 5 Waiver Wire! The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Week 5 waiver pickups and QB streamers! Andy, Mike, and Jason also talk through drop candidates at each position. Plus, injury updates and a new edition of “Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for October 5th, 2021.
  
 (06:50) - Monday Night Recap
 (10:35) - Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire
 (24:10) - NFL News
 (31:35) - Week 5 Waivers
 (33:50) - WR Waivers
 (48:10) - RB Waivers
 (58:50) - TE Waivers
 (01:02:10) - DST Streamers
 (01:03:35) - QB Streamers
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
